word: "SOME HAVE SUPPOSED THAT THE VERY PATTERN GIVEN WAS THE PATTERN THAT ALL WERE TO ADOPT. THIS IS NOT SO. BUT SOMETHING AS SIMPLE AS THIS WOULD BE THE BEST WE COULD ADOPT UNDER THE CIRCUMSTANCES. NO ONE PRECISE STYLE HAS BEEN GIVEN ME AS THE EXACT RULE TO GUIDE ALL IN THEIR DRESS."--E. G. WHITE LETTER 19, 1897. QUOTED IN THE STORY OF OUR HEALTH MESSAGE, PAGE 145.
